title: T-Cube: a fast, self-disclosing pen-based alphabet

references.text: BIattner, M., Sumikawa, D., and Greenberg, R. Earcons and icons: Their structure and common design principles, in Human-Computer interaction 4, 1 (1989), pp. 11-44.
